thread.title: Phoebe Burgess claims ‘mum-ophobic’ waiter kicked her and baby out of cafe in Avalon | Daily Telegraph
thread.title_full: Phoebe Burgess claims ‘mum-ophobic’ waiter kicked her and baby out of cafe in Avalon | Daily Telegraph

title: Phoebe Burgess claims ‘mum-ophobic’ waiter kicked her and baby out of cafe in Avalon | Daily Telegraph
text:
Use keywords to search content on this website Search Use keywords to search content on this website media_camera The picture Sam Burgess posted on Instagram when his wife and Phoebe gave birth to their daughter. Phoebe Burgess claims ‘mum-ophobic’ waiter kicked her and baby out of cafe in Avalon The Sunday Telegraph February 19, 2017 12:00am PHOEBE Burgess has slammed a Northern Beaches cafe after a waitress she claimed to be “mum-ophobic” allegedly kicked her and her three-week-old baby out of its premises. The wife of NRL player Sam Burgess took to social media to criticise Nourished Wholefoods cafe in Avalon, claiming one of its employees booted her out of the restaurant. “Yesterday was the first time I’ve been asked to move/leave an empty cafe with a 3 week old baby asleep in her pram,” the TV personality wrote. “Cheers to the mum-ophobic waiter who made me terrified to do it again. Imagine if I’d started feeding as planned …” media_camera What Phoebe Burgess posted on Instagram about the cafe. media_camera Phoebe Burgess when she was pregnant. Picture: Toby Zerna Burgess, who welcomed the arrival of her firstborn daughter Poppy Alice in the final week of January, didn’t respond to Confidential’s calls for comment yesterday. However the owner cafe in question said he was “mortified” at the claims, especially seeing as though he was at the hospital welcoming the arrival of his second-born child at the time. “Coincidentally I was at the hospital myself with my wife who had just given birth to our second child,” new owner Patrick told Confidential. “I am absolutely mortified at the thought of this even happening. “It is not what we condone and I honestly cannot believe that anyone I have working for me would have done this.” Related Phoebe and Sam Burgess are expecting their first child 0:24 
The Today Show team congratulates Phoebe Burgess, who has announced she and Sam Burgess are expecting their first child. Courtesy: Today Show July 27th 2016 /video/video.news.com.au/News/ Phoebe and Sam Burgess are expecting their first child Patrick added that there would be consequences for his employee, if they had done what Burgess alleges. “As I said I wasn’t there at the time, however I am trying to get to the bottom of it with my staff,” he said.
